title: What font is? - Nobel Prize founder
content:
This is a logo from 1892 of one of Alfred Nobel´s (founder of the Nobel Prize) companies. Can anyone help me with the name of this font? If not, a similar font would be very appreciated.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150201021336im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ngab_4384.jpg)
author: Nickokick

comments.content: Sorry, don't know this one. Some I like though: [Pyramus](http://web.archive.org/web/20150201021336/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/pyramus-nf), [Athena](http://web.archive.org/web/20150201021336/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/solotype/athena)
Thank you, Ryuk. Pyramus isn´t bad.
